About mir-commons

Utilities for Java programming with Spring and Hibernate.

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
mir-commons-base-model Provides a ready-to-use DAO layer implementation based on Java Generics.
mir-commons-db-utils Provides easy-to-use features to access DB without JPA integration.
